message: Let's split it 60-40, it's a fair start!
You're getting less than 40%? I'm being generous!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, let's try again!
You're not getting more than 50%? I'm still being generous!
Let's meet in the middle and split it 50-50, it's only fair!
You're trying to take advantage of me with a 50-50 split? Think again!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Fine, we'll split it 50-50, but don't expect me to go any lower!
